title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: positron.tutorials collection tutorials working Positron. Covers scripts, Quarto documents, git, Github, Quarto websites. Makes extensive use tools tutorial.helpers package.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: install package CRAN: can install development version GitHub : positron.tutorials currently avaible CRAN.

title: Tutorials for Learning Positron and Related Tools
text: sevene tutorials package. paratheses title tutorial, show code running tutoria. Example: Positron Code (“01-code”). Introduce students Positron writing R code simple scripts. Positron Quarto (“02-quarto”). Demonstrate tricks working R code using Positron, also explain Quarto documents. Terminal (“03-terminal”). Teach command line. Positron GitHub Introduction (“04-github-1”). Explain basics Git GitHub, mostly context Positron. Positron GitHub Advanced (“05-github-2”). Provide practice working Git/GitHub, including details use GitHub Pages. Quarto Websites Introduction (“06-websites-1”). Demonstrate basics website construction using Quarto projects. Quarto Websites Advanced (“07-websites-2”). Practice Quarto websites, focus splitting data analysis tasks separate files.

title: Process Submissions — process_submissions
text: function processes submissions directory containing HTML/XML files. extracts tables files, filters based pattern key variables, returns either summary tibble combined tibble data.

title: Process Submissions — process_submissions
code: process_submissions(   path,   pattern = ".",   return_value = "Summary",   key_vars = NULL,   verbose = 0,   keep_file_name = NULL )

title: Process Submissions — process_submissions
text: path path directory containing HTML/XML files. pattern pattern match file names (default: "."). return_value type value return. Allowed values "Summary" (default) "". key_vars character vector key variables extract "id" column (default: NULL). verbose integer specifying verbosity level. 0: messages, 1: file count messages, 2: detailed messages files, 3: detailed messages including file problems (default: 0). keep_file_name Specifies whether keep file name summary tibble. Allowed values NULL (default), "" (keep entire file name), "Space" (keep first space), "Underscore" (keep first underscore). used return_value "Summary".

title: Process Submissions — process_submissions
text: return_value "Summary", returns tibble one row file, columns corresponding key_vars, additional "answers" column indicating number rows tibble. return_value "", returns tibble data combined files.

title: Process Submissions — process_submissions
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Process submissions with default settings process_submissions("path/to/directory")  # Process submissions with a specific pattern and key variables process_submissions("path/to/directory", pattern = "^submission", key_vars = c("name", "email"))  # Process submissions and return all data process_submissions("path/to/directory", return_value = "All")  # Process submissions with verbose output (level 3) process_submissions("path/to/directory", verbose = 3)  # Process submissions and keep the entire file name in the summary tibble process_submissions("path/to/directory", return_value = "Summary", keep_file_name = "All") } # }

title: positron.tutorials 0.1.0
text: Use GitHub Pages publishing. Redo PNG files. Transition tutorials covering Positron instead RStudio.
